turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi, how are you today? I have a question for you, how interested are you in helping children in need?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hi! I'm doing great, and yourself? I am very interested.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Im doing great too. A lot better than the children I speak of that are suffering in developing countries. Have you ever heard of the organization Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No, I haven't. What is the organization about?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That sounds really interesting. What countries does Save the Children operate in?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It operates out of the United States, it actually helps children in the US and developing countries such as Ethiopia, Indonesia, Vietnam, and many more. Just a small amount, pennies, would make a huge difference to these kids.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I had no idea it operated outside of the United States. I understand how a donation, no matter how small would help this children. Do you know where the money goes towards to?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It would go into a general fund and the organization would put the money where it is most needed. Are you willing to make a small donation between fifty cents to two dollars that you would gain from this task to go toward this Charity?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would be more than willing to give a donation. Before I do that, I would like to know how the organization handles the money. I have no doubt its a trustworthy organization, I just want to know how it helps the children.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: The money goes towards their healthcare, their education, what tugs on my heart strings the most is that it also goes towards protecting the children from abuse and neglect, exploitation and violence. Of course it also helps feed needy children and goes towards emergency care for any type of natural disasters or other emergencies.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: It does sound like the organization is helping improve and save children's lives

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It is! Imagine if we convinced our friends and family to donate a small amount as well, people like you and I could actually make a difference in the world.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes! So many children around the world could have better an improved lives. Why is this organization not well known?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I have heard of it before but not extensively. I learned a lot about them through their website  URL How much would you like to donate? The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thanks for sending me the website! I will check it out. I would like to donate .50.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You are a wonderful person, thank you for showing love to children in need.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I really wish I could donate more. Maybe one day when I have enough income I will.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am in the same boat, but every penny counts and weather it is .50 cents or 500 you are making a difference. Thank you and have a wonderful day.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you for all the information. Hope you also have a wonderful day.
